item.title: Wordpress Export Import Site Escaped Character Challenges - "
item.description: When you export a Wordpress site and import the site into a new Wordpress site you will notice that a few HTML entities that are not allowed in an XML output got escaped. In simple terms, you will see a lot of " and if you use a Mac OSx system, your will see - “ and ” displayed as content in your blog pages. Well here’s a way to correct them.
